availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Green Proctor (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Lawrence Proctor. Father of George S. M. Proctor, Joseph Proctor, Mary E. Proctor, Ruth Proctor, Susan M. Proctor, Sarah Proctor, James W. Proctor, Tarteles Proctor, Cynthia Proctor, and John A. Proctor. Farmer in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Rockcastle County. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern District, p. 159B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 490.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 6, p. 87B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Rockcastle County, KY, July and August 1863, p. 126.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Rockcastle County Births.
"W. G. Proctor Dead," Mount Vernon Signal (Mount Vernon, KY), March 22, 1907, p. 3.
"Susan M Proctor (1852-1853)," Find A Grave, Memorial 6932357, accessed October 12, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6932357.
"William Green 'Willis' Proctor (1828-1907)," Find A Grave, Memorial 6959006, accessed October 12, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6959006.
